description.jp:
長らく姉であるイダの名を用いて「暁の
血盟」の一員として活動していた女性。
幼いころに侵攻を受け奪われてしまった
故郷を取り戻すため マスクを外して仲
間たちに素性を明かした。
多くの人から託された想いを胸に 自身
の役目を果たすため戦う。
description.gl: A young woman who long operated as a Scion of the Seventh Dawn under the guise of her older sister、 Yda. She would finally remove her mask and reveal her identity to her comrades during the effort to reclaim her homeland. She carries on to fulfill her role、 entrusted with the hopes of many Eorzeans.

jp.text: それじゃ 強行突破……\nいっちゃおうか！
何度でもやっちゃるよ！
目指す未来を 絶対に勝ち取るんだ！
どんな壁だろうとも撃ち砕いて 前に進むだけだッ！
誰かを虐げてのさばることを\n自由なんて言わない！

gl.text: When all of this is over、 we're going to celebrate─together─just you wait!
Come on、 let's find a way out of here!
Let's do this once and for all!
I'm going to seize the future I want with my own two hands!
No more running. No more hiding. Let's finish this!
You're slaves to a tyrant! There's no freedom in that!

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack\nHP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies\nGrants [S Max BRV Up] and [S Attack Up] to party for 3 turns
desc.gl: 2-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack\nDeals proportionate HP damage to each target\nParty: 3 turns MAX BRV Up I, ATK Up I
desc.jp:
2HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
味方全員に3ACTION「最大BRV小アップ」
「攻撃力小アップ」付与

desc.gl: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV
desc.jp: 最大BRVアップ：最大BRVが上昇する

desc.gl: ATK Up: Raises ATK
desc.jp: 攻撃力アップ：攻撃力が上昇する

desc.en:
Raises party BRV based on Attack
Grants [Fists of Fire] for 5 turns
Low Action Delay
Does not increase turn count
Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

While [Fists of Fire] is active:
• Becomes [Fire Tackle]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Attack
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets

[Fists of Fire] has the following effects:
• Raises own Max BRV and Attack
• Raises party Initial BRV
• Grants [BRV Regen] to party
desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own ATK
Self: 5 turns Fists of Fire
High turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
Becomes Fire Tackle while Fists of Fire active
desc.jp:
味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
自身に5ACTION「紅蓮の構え」付与
行動負荷が低い
総ACTION数に加算されない
召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
「紅蓮の構え」付与中
「紅蓮羅刹衝」に変化

desc.gl: Fists of Fire: Raises own MAX BRV, ATK; restores a certain amount of party's BRV; raises party's INT BRV (does not stack)
desc.jp: 紅蓮の構え：自身の最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇し 味方全員のBRVを一定量回復し初期BRV上昇（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.gl: Grants party BRV based on own ATK\n2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack\nDeals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.jp: 味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算\n＋2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃\nターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ

desc.gl: Increases BRV based on ATK\nMelee BRV attack + HP attack\nDeals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.jp: 自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算\n＋近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃\nターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ

desc.en:
Raises own BRV based on Attack
Grants [Brotherhood] for 6 turns
Triggers [The Forbidden Chakra] afterwards
　∟ 5-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack
　∟ Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies
　∟ Extends existing [Fists of Fire] by 1 turn

While [Chakra Gauge] is at 5
• Becomes [Brotherhood & The Forbidden Chakra+]
　∟ Increased potency and improved effects
　∟ Consumes entire [Chakra Gauge] after use

[Brotherhood] has the following effects:
• Raises own Max BRV and Attack
• Increases [Chakra Gauge] by 1 when an ally uses an ability (excluding Additional Ability and enhanced BRV/HP Attack)

[Chakra Gauge] increases by 1 after using an ability (excluding Additional Ability and enhanced BRV/HP Attack)
Maxed at 5
desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Self: 6 turns Brotherhood buff
Triggers the Forbidden Chakra (5-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals proportionate HP damage to each target) after use
Extends active Fists of Fire duration 1 turn

While Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra equipped:
 • Abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 (limit 5; abilities changed from BRV Attack, HP Attack excluded)
 • Ally abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 while Brotherhood buff active (limit 5)
 • Becomes Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra+ while special effect Chakra at 5; reduces special effect Chakra by 5 after use
desc.jp:
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算し
6ACTION強化効果「桃園結義」付与
その後 以下の「陰陽闘気斬」が追加発動
5HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に付与されている「紅蓮の構え」を1ACTION延長
「桃園結義＆陰陽闘気斬」装備中
アビリティ使用で特殊効果「闘気」1加算（上限5）
（通常「BRV攻撃」通常「HP攻撃」が変化したものと
アディショナルアビリティは除く）
強化効果「桃園結義」付与中は味方が使用しても
特殊効果「闘気」1加算（上限5）
特殊効果「闘気」5の時 「桃園結義＆陰陽闘気斬＋」に変化し
使用後特殊効果「闘気」5消費
